Class StockAlphaBeta

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
engine.forPlayer.forAI.StockAlphaBeta
All Implemented Interfaces:
MoveStrategy
public class StockAlphaBeta extends Observable implements MoveStrategy
The StockAlphaBeta class represents a chess engine that employs the alpha-beta search algorithm with Lazy SMP parallel search optimization. It uses the Young Brothers Wait concept to improve search efficiency in a parallel environment.
